record.title: NATO FREEDOM CONSOLIDATION ACT OF 2007

speaking.paragraph: Madam Speaker, I ask unanimous consent to take from the Speaker's table the Senate bill (S. 494) to endorse further enlargement of the North Atlantic Treaty Organization (NATO) and to facilitate the timely admission of new members to NATO, and for other purposes, and ask for its immediate consideration in the House.

record.narrative: The Clerk read the title of the Senate bill.
record.chair: Is there objection to the request of the gentleman from Tennessee?
record.narrative: The Clerk read the Senate bill, as follows:
